name: Pieced Together (Dancetrap, King Hexagon)
description:
This Valentine's day, Tabs (Red) and Blank (Blue) are put to the ultimate test of love.  Help them get through the course so they can kindle at the shrine. They cannot proceed alone.

Made for RGDC Spring Game Jam 2023

Credits

Hugo Serinese
Ethan Guidry
Phillip Brown

Controls

Move - Left/Right or W/D
Switch - X
Combine/Disconnect -  C (When next to each other)
Restart - R
Quit - Esc (Press and Hold)
